OPEN_VIDEO_TITLE: Choose a Video/Audio file to open...
OPEN_LOG_FILE: Choose a Log file to open...
REBOOT_CONFIRM_DETAIL: Do you want to reboot now?
SNIPPET_GUIDE_T: $t will replaced current text you have already input.
SNIPPET_GUIDE_C: The caret will move to the $c location.
AUTOSAVE_AFTER: min.(You can enable it from [File] menu.
AUTO_LOCKON_TYPE: Start input memo field from empty.
AUTO_LOCKON_ADDMEMO: Just before adding memo to the list.
SKIPTIME_GUIDE: You can select base jump time from [Playback] menu of bottom menu of [◀◀][▶▶] buttons.
SAVE_LOG_FILE_AS: Choose location, name and format to non-standard log file...
LITE_SUCCESS_MESSAGE:
A data file for Do-gagan Lite '%1' was created at same folder for media file.
Do you also download the latest Do-gagan Lite html file from server?
(requires internet connection.)
LITE_DOWNLAOD_FAIL_MESSAGE:
Doqnloading faild.
Pleas hit 'OK' to open manual download page. Then doanload 'index.html', place it to the same folder of media file, rename it to same filename '%1'.
UNSAVED_DATA_MESSAGE:
%1 is not saved.
Save before close?
UNSAVED_DATA_MESSAGE_CONTINUE:
%1 is not saved.
Save before continue?
CANNNOT_SPLIT_CHARACTER_SELECTED: You can not split while selecting any letter(s).
CANNNOT_SPLIT_HERE: You can not split before the first letter.
INPUT_START_TIME:
The time code seemd to recorded in time (of the day) format instead of 0 started seconds.
Please specify the start time of this video file.
GUESS_FROM_FILENAME_FAILED:
Guessing time from filename failed.
"(blank)hh-mm-ss" format is needed.
